item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-11-10
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Made Christine Chicken Picatta with Salad #
  • RT: It took Google to Bring Free WiFi to Boston's Logan Airport (via @stevegarfield) #
  • Possible sign of warming economy in Florida? I've received a couple of phone calls this week if I'm interested in IT jobs in Florida. #

Powered by Twitter Tools
